Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam spoke about Imad Wasim not being available for the opening match against the United States of America due to a side strain.
Imad Wasim decided to reverse the decision of retirement and was included in the squad for the T20 World Cup 2024.
Pakistan will start their 2024 T20 tournament against the United States of America at Dallas, Texas on 6th June before they face arch-rivals India on 9th June in New York.
Pakistan needs to be careful as the USA began the World Cup chasing down 195 against Canada in Dallas.
